DOC.brief_summary: Obstructed defecation syndrome (ODS) is a widespread and disabling syndrome. With this study the investigators want to evaluate the long term results of Stapled Transanal Rectal Resection (STARR) performed with Contour Transtar device in the treatment of ODS. A re-evaluation of 113 patients subjected to STARR from June 2007 to January 2010 was conducted.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Results of STARR With Contour Transtar
DOC.criteria: ODS presence of a rectocele that did not empty and/or a rectorectal or rectoanal intussusception. anal sphincter contractile deficiency previous rectal resection
